TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
Strap on!

Staff is here, means the station is near!

We can't stop we're going too fast!

If thats what you would like Maxmaps,

The what about this one?

http://www.childsplaycharity.org/

Based on helping children and with gaming too which seems relevant

im in for that one common guys get the devs some pizza and donate to some kids

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

Thats awesome xD made me laugh quite hard!

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

How many (world) cups of coffee did you all drink?

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

That's basically what I did at work during last 3 days. lol

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

Cheer them on with the words of the hype train!

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

Have you considered running around in circles making train noises?

What kind of crazy country do you live in where they tell you that on the train? o_0

In the Netherlands, you're better off waiting by the doors so you can run like a madman to catch your connection, because your train is invariably two minutes late (although "still on time" because of allowable "margins"... NS basterds...).

Lol, to be honest I don't ride the trains that often. But the ones at DFW Airport tell you to be seated or hold on.

Cheer them on with the words of the hype train!

I can imagine someone running through the office shouting chakachakachoochoooo!

If thats what you would like Maxmaps,

The what about this one?

http://www.childsplaycharity.org/

Based on helping children (in hospital) and with gaming too which seems relevant

EDIT: Its world wide too

I second this

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

No credit for 0.24 for you! ;P

Wouldn't it be great if they just tried to sneakily release it and not mention it anywhere, like roll it out at 3AM and not announce it at all. HypeTrain would explode from all the compressed hype that would just flush into the system when it was realized.

Ok so if people donate to here: http://www.childsplaycharity.org/

Can we put with love: THE HYPETRAIN (Kerbal Space Program Fans)

*Insert Personal Message*
This thread right now
The server right now:

What kind of crazy country do you live in where they tell you that on the train? o_0

In the Netherlands, you're better off waiting by the doors so you can run like a madman to catch your connection, because your train is invariably two minutes late (although "still on time" because of allowable "margins"... NS basterds...).

Nah, that's nothing.

In Poland they got the same, only not two minutes late, but rather forty minutes late. In a summer. In winter it turns into 8 hours.

(but to be fair: At least their trains are cheap. In UK sometimes buying an airplane ticket is cheaper, lol)
Remember guys. There will be no release today.
Has anyone ever seen Houseguest? You know the scene where Sinbad yells "DENZAAAAIIIL! DENZEL WASHINGTON IN THE BUILDING!!" and the airport goes nuts? Anyone else feel like that?

I can imagine someone running through the office shouting chakachakachoochoooo!

xD I just actually imagined that.

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

Open the door to the realm of coding, shove a carton of Pizza with a Sixpack of coke through it from the outside, close the door again without beein seen.
So should we start a .25 hype train......

I demand to know who was out of their seats on the #HypeTrain that made the announcer come on! What part of "remain in your seats until the captain turns off the fasten seat belt light" did you guys miss?

The #HypeTrain isn't as a safe cruising altitude yet, so please remain in your seats and wait for .24 like good passengers.

In the case of a loss of cabin pressure, Hype-masks will drop from the ceiling. Please put the mask on and tighten before helping those around you; even thought the bag may not inflate, Hype is still flowing -- breathe normally.

In the case of a water landing...

Quick, Russia! Get it while it's free!

I'm very, very confused.

Remember guys. There will be no release today.

You're off.

*kicks in the butt off the train*

Quick, Russia! Get it while it's free!

http://i.gyazo.com/b8f7d26a922d56527443b2379749da7b.png

I really hope it's not some obscure political joke "awarding" their guerrilla for shooting down MH17.

So should we start a .25 hype train......

not just yet this one hasn't pulled into the final destination.
